status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1hkdn","text":"Seed NIH HEK293T cells into a 6-well plate (900k cells/well if set up in the morning, 950k cells/well if set up in the afternoon). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ba47","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3kp2c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ch8mp","text":"Set up 1 well for each construct you wish to generate a virus harvest for, can be scaled up according to your need. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Day 2: The following protocol is designed for one well of the 6-well plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"26crj","text":"Transfect cells with viral and helper vectors using lipofectamine LTX. Combine the following in a 1.5 mL tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d37ar","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bth88","text":"      viral vector   construct (pBMN, pBABE or pMX)  1.5 µg    well gag-pol vector  1.0 µg    well VSV-G vector  0.5 µg    Opti-MEM (RT)  500 µL  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":146}],"data":{}},{"key":"1rk7a","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["315","190"],"data":[["viral vector construct (pBMN, pBABE or pMX) containing cDNA of interest","1.5 µg"],["gag-pol vector","1.0 µg (amount for 1 well)"],["VSV-G vector","0.5 µg (amount for 1 well)"],["Opti-MEM (RT)","500 µL"]],"guid":"01C3DBF4D75C11EDB9470A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["viral vector construct (pBMN, pBABE or pMX) containing cDNA of interest","1.5 µg"],["gag-pol vector","1.0 µg (amount for 1 well)"],["VSV-G vector","0.5 µg (amount for 1 well)"],["Opti-MEM (RT)","500 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

Incubate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":130,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":145,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":151,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ee46r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"564C40A0D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"61FF8D80D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5A202C00D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"5EB0FEC0D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Day 2: The following protocol is designed for one well of the 6-well plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4nvrf","text":"Once the 20 min incubation starts, replace the media in each well with   DMEM/10% FBS media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"7C650F60D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Day 2: The following protocol is designed for one well of the 6-well plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6j6an","text":"When the 20 min incubation finishes, add the optimum/liposome mix to the well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50evk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9qkn7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f9fat","text":"Do it gently on the side of the well.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"t2me","text":"In the morning, remove the old media from the HEK293T cells which may contain viruses at this stage) into a beaker of beach and add   of fresh growth media. The next day, viruses can be harvested for infection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":132,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6o4qo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"C1187E30D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etnri","text":"Seed the target cells (about 100k-120k cells) into a 6-well plate if intending to do infection with fresh viruses. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"980u2","text":"In the late afternoon, collect viral supernatant from HEK293Ts, spin down at max speed for   to pellet debris and filter through 0.45µm syringe filters. Viral particles can freshly be used for infection on the cells plated out on day 3 (see below) or can be frozen at   for future use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":268,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4u4hr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"D400BBC0D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CBC816B0D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7eoqt","text":"For second harvest, add   fresh growth media back to HEK293T cells for 2 days and harvest again (on Day 6).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"DE930840D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8o898","text":"For infection, harvested viruses are topped up with fresh growth media to make up a total of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"E5F104C0D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9nfp","text":"Add the   of virus-containing media (from step 3) to the target cells. Add polybrene to a final concentration of   to the well and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"EC3CF500D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"F27A1830D76511EDB92AC7F86396B125","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ebcg","text":"The viruses can be removed from the cells into a beaker of bleach after 24 h (Day 5) or 48 h (Day 6) and fresh media can be added to the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3gv7d","text":"All waste must be treated as viral waste for at least 3 media changes over 3 days post-infection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
